reviews.review: Это продолжение первой части. И она опровдала все ожидания!! Здесь есть отличный сюжет, хорошая графика даже по сегодняшним меркам, есть онлаин режим в который можно поиграть с друзьями и вообще это лучшая головоломка!!

PORTAL 2 bölüm tasarımlarıyla, bulmacalarıyla ve kendine has mizahıyla kesinlikle herkesin tatması gereken bir deneyim.
Singleplayer modu dışında arkadaşlarınızla beraber oynıyacağınız CO-OP modu da bir o kadar iyi.
Özellikle oyunun kalitesini düşünürsek bu oyuna bu fiyat gerçekten çok iyi (indirimlerle 7,75tl ye kadar düşüyor)
Single 'ı bitirirseniz bulun birini CO-OP modunuda kesinlikle deneyin.herkese tavsiye ederim.
not:İlk oyunu sevip beğendiyseniz gözünüz kapalı alın daha da üstüne koymuş.

story mode made me cry

co op is fun

community test chambers are amazing

10/10
It is one of the best puzzle games ever created.
сломал ногу в очередной раз прыгая между порталами

I absolutely adore portal to begin with, and the fact that the community test chambers are still going strong only makes it better. I would completely recommend this game to anyone who enjoys puzzle solving games.
画质和声音，剧情都非常棒，就是玩久了有点头晕。。
从第一部就对G姐有好感，打通第二部后爱上G姐了

Super Spiel!
Ich empfehle das Spiel sehr, da das Spiel sehr Story-Haltig ist und nicht nur ein normales Puzzle-Game. Es ist jetzt schon zu einer meiner Favorit-Games geworden und ich denke, dass das jeder mal gespielt haben muss!
Игра хорошая но там есть не дооботки рекомендую к игре
죽기 전 꼭 해봐야 하는 게임
fun  fun fun fun fun fun fun fun fun fun fun
Классная игра, благодаря ей понравились головоломки
Imagine this is a new era of transportation

Последняя олиночная игра от Valve.  Это по истине шедевр жанра головоломка.
это одна из тех игр, которую можно играть вечно и она никогда в жизни никому не надоест.
Words cannot describe the amazing quality of this game. PLAY PORTAL
it is the best game i have ever seen
Kennen das spiel schon seit 5 Jahren und finde es immer wieder cool zu spielen
good grafitsh. the sandbox is needet to be easier to handle
One of the better puzzle games I've played, great story too. A beautiful gem that makes you wish Valve still made games.
看到麦田的那一刻 我感受到了自由
J'ai adoré les puzzles et les secrets. Le mode COOP n'est pas si mal non plus
除了没人陪我玩其他还挺好的

Este jeugo es la segunda vez que me lo compro:

PS3
PC

Y me encanta, me lo e terminado como 11 veces, hasta podria hacer un Speedrun, eso si, y si te lo terminas en individual, pues esta el modo coop, el cual, por lo que juego en PS3 a pantalla partida, es bastante divertido.

Y lo mejor, es que si quieres jugar mas, tienes a la Wprshop, con un monton de mods y Mapas creados por la comunidad.
Best co-op puzzle game ever played. Loved the concept and community maps are too good!
If you don't know about the awesomeness of Portal 2 being 2020 you're doing something wrong with your life

MY God i was not expecting to fall in love with this game series. Portal was a game i wasn't expecting to take my love, but it did. The puzzles are interesting and hard enough to take you a while but not hard to need a guide the whole time. I don't know why I'm writing a review since this game is a classic, but i guess i need somewhere to express my joy for the franchise. The Co-op missions were so much fun and gave me some awesome memories with my best friend. Her and I often reflect of the time we played and miss being able to play the main route. If you need a good game, buy this one. The solo missions on their own are worth it. The gameplay is fun and the dialouge is so entertaining, it made me kinda depressed when it was over. This is definatly a game I'll be playing again once i forget how to solve each room


TL:DR, Get the game goddamit!
story and game play amazing AND its awesome how the community can make maps!

A campanha é SENSACIONAL! No começo você se depara com mecanismo de laser/feixe de luz, ao longo das fases você começa a mexer com líquidos(géis), ocorre reviravoltas com a introdução de um novo personagem / [spoiler] futuro antagonista [/spoiler] . Me emocionei no final e a musiquinha é incrível. Preciso de alguém para jogar as fases cooperativas, só necessito encontrar alguém k
Just an all out awesome game.
If you loved the Half life series, platformers, puzzles, or just the first portal game you will love this gem.
The best game I've ever played
amazing game with stunning graphics, amazing soundtrack, and great story. i did buy again for a friend.

jogo incrivel, personagels carismaticos,graficos muito bonito,como posso descrever esse jogo?

o modo de criação da pra passa muito tempo.
recomiendo mucho este juego para 2020 es realmente divertido jugar con familiares o amigos honestamente no me arrepiento comprado este juego  me gusto mucho.

Ya pues pinche valve ponte las pilas duracell para contar hasta 3 porfavar estomos asi como muchos años  y ni contas hacia 3 pero si que un bot lo dice y tu no ya po gaben no sea malo vayase ala escuela ( ASI buen jueg osi osi)

i dont have friends to play coop with

other than that its a great game

which made my 4 braincells look up tutorials
Much like Valve's other games, Portal 2 is a timeless classic, a proper sequel, and is one of the best games I've ever played.
Gameplay is amazing. The story is awesome and flows really well and the graphics are absolutely f*cking godlike. 11/10 would buy a 2nd time.
Fun with a friend. Puzzles n stuff.
"Because you have a portal gun and you can portal gun around! You can shoot it, one is blue and one is orange. That's it" - My baby cousin

this is probably the best game i have played also i have been playing for a year by now and im proud of myself also dont worry about having a potato pc that looks like glados potato form because you can now play games like this without worrying about lag even in co op which is suprising because games like stormworks are so laggy and have roblox kind of graphics so i recommend this game for good graphics and having potato pcs and wanting to have fun at the same time (this game was my longest played game)
